Home About Contact

Aurum - what we're about

We’re a small marketing company. While we have experience working with large brands, our happy place is working with entrepreneurs and other small businesses to help make their dreams a reality. Working backwards from your business goals, we execute on everything from targeted, scrappy social strategies to aggressive, multi-platform approaches to scale. We’re your partners in this, so you’ll hear from us often and be fully in the loop on exactly what’s happening in your account.

Austin Smith

Principle Marketer

Austin is the principal marketer at Aurum as well as the primary account manager. He’s worked both in-house for large brands but prefers one-on-one partnerships with small business owners because he loves collaborating with people on their passion projects. Austin is currently perfecting his homemade vermouth recipe and dreams of one day opening his own tapas and vermouth bar.

Kim Dryden

Designer & Creative Producer

Kim supports Aurum’s accounts as a hands-on designer and manager of all things creative. With experience in both a big tech company and scrappy start-ups, she drives creative teams and strategic plans forward but also likes getting her hands dirty in Illustrator and Sketch. Kim’s living her best life when she’s reading a good book at a coffee shop and will be a regular at Austin’s tapas bar.
